transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji bataiye
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji ek complaint maine dali hui hai
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji ji sir bataiye complaint dali hui hai
Customer: Aap Vindhya se baat kar rahe ho?
Executive: Haan haan
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji bataiye
Customer: Sir aapka complaint na register ho chuka hai aapki ek mail aayi thi hamare paas raat ko
Customer: Haan
Executive: To hamari team usse follow kar rahi hai jo concern department hai unko mail kar rahi hai fir unki or se aapke paas call bhi aayega hai na hamari complaint team handle kar rahi hai usko
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Further koi update hoga to main aapko call kar dungi
Customer: Theek hai ji Nikki ji baat kar rahe ho?
Executive: Haan haan main Nikki ji baat kar rahi hu mail aaya tha hamare paas
Customer: Theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Complaint was lodged.



Resolution:

- Complaint has been registered and the team is following up.

- The concerned department has been emailed.

- The customer will receive a call from the complaint team.

- Executive will call the customer if there are further updates.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. The customer will receive a call from the complaint team and the executive will provide further updates, if any.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

complaint, follow-up, updates
